s_title: Street Fighter III 3rd Strike - Fight for The Future
s_synopsis: This amazing fighter stars 18 brawlers from the Street Fighter III universe and introduces the new Leap Attack. Plus, a new Grade Judge system evaluates player performance at the end of each match. Huge characters and an innovative Hit-Frame system team up with the return of the Super Arts Fighting Styles. Experience totally seamless animation in the newest chapter of the greatest arcade series ever!
